column1: Does the founder hold a PhD from a prestigious institution?
Has the founder co-founded multiple startup ventures?
Has the founder held a leadership role in a technology company?
Does the founder have previous startup experience?
Has the founder worked full-time at a small number of companies?
Is the founder based in California?
Has the founder received moderate press or media coverage?
Does the founder have a strong personal brand or public presence?
Has the founder's previous startups been acquired?
Does the founder have experience in financial services?
